sentence: Weve proven that, but now this movement is a response to the movement that is trying to silence voices.? Milwaukee Independent OpEd: The Attack on Disney: A Case Study for How Fascism Progresses Toward Tyranny in America Floridas Republican Governor Ron DeSantis has declared war on Disney, while his colleague in Texas, Republican Governor Greg Abbott, is on a jihad against the parents of trans children.
title: Overnight News Digest: Russia attempts to grind Ukraine down; Sec. Clinton warns of fascism in US
